messages.content: I'm shocked! Shocked! Well, not that shocked.
I’m surprised by how quickly they were able to get a graphic for Kent.
Wow, I don't know how [NAME] handled that
I'm surprised that this is still happening despite the threats of an invasion of manbij.
I thought this allegation was squashed when it came out. I was surprised to see it still making headlines. Poor guy.
Surprised to not see Three Arrows on the list when he went from no videos at all to over 100,000 subscribers just in the course of 2018.
That's a surprise from this guy.
Surprised he's in. Imagined he was concussed. He was on another planet for a bit.
Don’t I know it! I can’t believe this breading station thing is so enormous.
I wondered the same thing. I never knew that this is a thing.
I've always wondered how much of this stuff doesn't end up on the internet
not in the slightest. im actually dumbfounded.
The music caught me off guard
Can’t believe [NAME] era is coming to an end... feels like yesterday I saw his 1st win against the cowboys with tiki breaking the rushing record.
Can't believe [NAME] has been in the league that long...
I'll be surprised if *Monty Python's Life of Brian* wasn't one of those.
Omg actually?! I mean no judgment , I am just SHOOK
I am shocked they don’t have a vanity plate that reads “Beer Cheez”
Wow. Did not realize [NAME] was a top 20
Hey what a coincidence so is a human head!
[NAME] should have come back. I'm surprised you could get any worse than the s10 one but shit i was wrong.
Oh my [NAME] why did I look
I'm not saying to hate them, I'm wondering why this sub just started worshiping them.
[NAME]. Gave up in October and haven’t looked back. I can’t believe how easy I’ve found it.
Losing my identity, wondering have I gone insane...
I’ve woken up next to some shocking things but just imagine finding the top of a police car in your room.
Tiki Lounge always smells like sewage. I'm surprise it's lasted this long.
Wonder if it’s possible for [NAME] to engage with a polite fan in a magnanimous way.
Wow! I’m barely 2 cities over and it isn’t even nearly that cold :o
Wow, so he was pulling his own little mini [NAME] scam. Explains why he couldn't use your reporting tool.
And oops AND a yikes. Maybe even as much as an OOF. Definitely a wow from me
> you're probably a little bit of a closeted nazi yourself. I'm just SHOCKED that someone named [NAME] might be a fascist
It’s shocking isn’t it? I paid less for a flight from London to Manchester than it would have cost for the train.
Wow that's not how you resolve things. Escalation is the last option.
Oh wow I forgot [NAME] and [NAME]. I have not read it.. have a link?
This response is highly unexpected yet logical. I’m fixin to chew on it for a spell.
Wow, your ex partner sounds exactly like mine.
Wow. Forget the separation, lawyer up and go straight to divorce.
Wow, who can afford this one?
Wow there a lot to choose from for 10 bucks or less too
I’ve never seen such dramatic tongue involvement.
Can’t believe a club paid $550k for Sandow that’s absurd.
Time flies when you're a semiprofessional quotemaker. I wonder what he's up to these days.
Wow you think 15 downvotes in Reddit from the YIMBY cult has any meaning? I didn't say anything pertaining to economics.
Oh for sure. Sometimes I wonder if they are actually harming there cause with the over the top hypocrisy the newcomers seem to see it quite quickly.
Wow, I remember having this kind of meal a lot as a kid.
Omg. I just noticed that! Holy fuck, how does she smell?
The altcoin thread!? This is the first time I've seen it in 6 months.
I've seen so many of these and I still have a massive amount of difficulty believing it is possible.
Wow look at this deep pockets eating a lentil a day, I have to slice mine to last me a month!!!
I wonder if truly might be work stress. He works long hours at a prestigious law firm. I need to five him more credit.
A surprise turn of events! I'm so glad you heard such great things about yourself!
Yep California, I would've been surprised if they cleared him.
Damn video made me think there was audio!!
looks unreal, like it's a toy or something.
Wow, 5 downvotes in 3 minutes. Go you!
I wondered where the quote about “supporting your azz” and was very pleased to finally find the train wreck that said it.
Oh wow. You really know your stuff. Luckily I don't have diabetes yet so that's something
Wow you really can’t handle losing can you?
Wonder what [NAME] [NAME] thinks about all this
So you then took that lie and began aggressively cheating on him? Your post history. Wow.
I was there on the opposite side of the field. I did not believe he made that catch until we saw it later on tv. Unreal.
Oh wait that's tonight?!?! Totally watching 😎
Damn, I didn't know that you used to mod there.
It would be a surprise to be sure, but a welcome one.
Wow, that's crazy. Ever tried DMT?
Please give us updates. Oh wow.
Oh no [NAME] bb what is you doin?
why are you a detective all of a sudden
Really? wow. I just reinstalled chrome from scratch, again. So it was Ghostery that caused the full screen issues?
Found the militant long time Southwest employee? ...and if not, I am constantly amazed at what random people will get mad about these days.
I mean...that’s quite obvious. I’m just left wondering what the other item is. 2/10
Wow they got them [NAME]? Those US agents are some lucky guys
Protestantism never cease to amaze me with its joke of theology and non existent historical justification.
Oh my [NAME] I almost forgot about the hot dr pepper in a glass glass made of glass
Wow. These people really deserve some *clove*, especially on subshops.
Didn't know they were doing matches on smaller pitch in the combine to see how they do with less reaction time. Thought that was interesting.
Looks like I posted it. Oh no!
*holy shit* I'm pretty sure the panther thought the same thing
Wow! Now that's some propaganda we could use more of!
wow, we really live in future
